Instruction: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add chopped onion, carrot, celery, and minced garlic to the pot. Cook until softened.
Add diced tomatoes, drained and rinsed kidney beans, drained and rinsed cannellini beans, and vegetable broth to the pot.
Bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in ditalini pasta, fresh spinach, Italian seasoning, salt, and black pepper.
Simmer for an additional 10 minutes or until the pasta is cooked and the spinach is wilted.
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed.
